ComicInfo.Title: Red Menace Part 1 Abduction
ComicInfo.Summary: Volume 2.Red Menace Part 1 Abduction: An old war buddy shows up asking Mike to help locate his daughter who is missing. Mike takes Holly with him to investigate. On the way, they encounter a drunk who claims he saw the daughter and her boyfriend abducted by a flying saucer one evening by the lake.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-03-22 18:46:28. [Issue ID 266545]
